name: Mirror House (Jokundor, Orionhart)
description:
Project made for the 2021 Indie Tales game jam. An escape room type game where mirrors must be utilized to escape. Find all eight tarot cards or remain trapped as a doll forever!

Controls:

WASD to move.

Left Click to grab and place.

Esc to pause and un-pause.

z + x to restart.

Made by Austin "Jokundor" Piko and Sam "OrionHart" Reinhart.
